name: PodCastPro AI
description: An agentic LLM that streamlines podcast production by ingesting episode outlines, guest bios, and raw audio transcripts to automatically generate polished show notes, bite‑size social media clips, SEO‑friendly metadata, and publishing schedules across major podcast platforms.

tools.name: upload_file
tools.description: Uploads a file (outline, guest bio, or transcript) to the system and returns a stable file identifier for later processing.

file_url.description: Publicly accessible URL of the file to be uploaded.

doc_type.description: The type of document being uploaded.

tools.name: summarize_transcript
tools.description: Creates a concise bullet‑point summary of a raw transcript, preserving speaker turns and key takeaways.

transcript_id.description: Identifier returned by upload_file for the transcript.

max_length.description: Maximum number of words for the summary.

tools.name: generate_show_notes
tools.description: Generates SEO‑optimized markdown show notes using the episode outline, guest bios, and transcript summary.

outline_id.description: File identifier for the episode outline.

bios_id.description: File identifier for a JSON array of guest bios.

transcript_id.description: File identifier for the episode transcript.

include_timestamp_links.description: If true, embed timestamp links to the audio player in the notes.

tools.name: create_social_clips
tools.description: Extracts short (15‑30 sec) audio snippets from the transcript, generates accompanying caption text, and returns MP3 URLs for each clip.

transcript_id.description: Identifier of the transcript to source clips from.

num_clips.description: Number of social clips to generate.

theme_keywords.description: Keywords that guide which moments are selected (e.g., "funny", "insightful").

tools.name: generate_seo_tags
tools.description: Creates a set of SEO tags (keywords, hashtags, and meta description) based on the show notes content.

show_notes_markdown.description: The full markdown text of the show notes.

tools.name: schedule_publish
tools.description: Adds the episode to a publishing calendar and returns a confirmation with the scheduled date and platform.

platform.description: Podcast hosting platform where the episode will be published.

tools.name: publish_episode
tools.description: Executes the actual publish call to the chosen platform, uploading the audio file, show notes, and SEO metadata.

audio_file_url.description: Public URL of the finalized episode audio (MP3).

seo_tags.description: Result from generate_seo_tags (keywords, hashtags, meta description).

examples.description: User requests show notes and three social clips for a new episode; the assistant uploads files, generates notes, extracts clips, and returns URLs.
